function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate hospital isolation measures leading to increased spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Higher rates of infection, overwhelmed healthcare system, increased mortality","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures, increase the number of medical beds, ensure availability of protective resources","Technologies":"Remote monitoring, contact tracing apps, telehealth, augmented reality for remote consultations","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, public health authorities"}]}
